overview: What Daddy does in Vegas, definitely stays in Vegas. Jack Dixon is taking a relaxing bath in his hotel room when bellboy Alex Hawk offers more than champagne to the hung stud. Cain Marko thinks he's just getting a massage but what's a daddy to do when he finds a hot and willing ass? Lance Charger promises his husband he won't be playing while away but August Alexander's warm, wet mouth soon makes him break that promise. Jack Dixon and Cain Marko have already busted their cheating nuts so they pair up and Jack gives Cain's thick ass a good pounding. Then Lance Charger is on the prowl and gives hungry bottom Andy Dango all he can handle.
title: What Daddy Does in Vegas
